feed.title: Some Clever Webpage Name
feed.subtitle: This site serves as a "homebase" of sorts for the various projects, thoughts, and varia that I'd like to have on the World Wide Web. Probably won't be anything profound, but hey, who knows. Have a look.

entry.content:
Humble Beginnings

So, Hello there! Youâ€™ve stumbled upon a blog, one upon millions of similar troves of text and thoughts out on the internet. I hope you enjoy your stay.

Just to give an idea of what this site is about - I built this site from scratch as a bit of a programming & coding project over the summer of 2023. Yes, this includes the CSS, so if the styling seems somewhat elementary (or if it breaks, especially on mobile!), thatâ€™s why.

Iâ€™ve had this domain for a little while and Iâ€™ve gone through a couple different website hosting services & content management systems, but all in all, I just want this site to be a little place to share a bit about who I am and to share a bit about the projects Iâ€™m working on. There could be some other various thoughts intermingled, though I wouldnâ€™t count on it.

So yeah, thatâ€™s what Iâ€™ve got going here. Feel free to peruse, browse my code on Github, or even say hi over on Twitter (or X, or whatever itâ€™ll be called in the futureâ€¦). Thanks for stopping by!

Pax Chrisi.
